name: Sport
description: Sport is the biggest community in the world. Beyond the winning and losing, it drives change and social justice, while promoting fairness, equality, and respect across international boundaries. Get together here, celebrate what you love, and be united in your differences.

name: Social Sciences
description: Delve deeper into society and culture and pick the brains of hand-chosen experts. Get insights from leading academic institutions and researchers. Learn more about why we do what we do and how it affects the world around us.

name: Physics
description: Physics explores the ever-changing fabric of our world. From subatomic substructures to gas giants, and from the complication of movement to electromagnetic circles, you get to hash out the big issues here.

name: Architecture & Design
description: "Design creates culture. Culture shapes values. Values determine the future." - Robert L. Peters. Help design the architecture of the future, and join a community of built-environment enthusiasts and designers here.

name: Indigenous Peoples
description: Indigenous communities champion biodiversity, cultural heritage, historical artefacts, and knowledge. This collection shows why indigenous communities matter and provides a platform for indigenous activists.

name: Food & Drink
description: Everyone has food and drink in common, yet it highlights our uniqueness by offering an insight into history and culture. Cook up some great connections with a side of inclusivity.

name: Hunger, Disease & Water
description: A world where everyone has their basic needs met. That's the goal. But hunger, unsafe drinking water, and disease are the reality of many. Help us add to the sum of human knowledge. Report on global health, mobilise people and resources, and advance critical research.

name: History
description: ‘Those who do not learn from history are doomed to repeat it’ – George Santayana. The history community here helps us analyse the past so we can build a better future.

name: Ukraine Invasion
description: Newsmast was inspired by the online community which emerged following the invasion of Ukraine. It’s designed by a Ukrainian app designer. What better place to share your news and comments.

name: Women’s Voices
description: Womanhood is power and powerlessness. However discriminated against you feel as a woman, you’ll enjoy a binding sense of community here. Celebrate womanhood through information, support, and empowerment.

name: Football
description: Newsmast is about community. There’s nothing more communal than fans coming together in the shared belief that this is your team’s time. And if not, there’s always next year.

name: Journalism & Comment
description: You’re entitled to your opinion. You’re also entitled not to be subjected to fake news and misinformation. Get all the freedom of speech you need right here, without the hate and harassment.

name: Biology
description: Shared knowledge can advance healthy living. In our biology community, you can discuss how cells work, the interplay between genetics and the environment, biological ecosystems, and more.

name: Books & Literature
description: Honour the beauty and complexity of language. Take a deep dive into the worlds of fiction and non-fiction and celebrate the voices of exceptional writers, poets, and creators from around the world.

name: Activism & Civil Rights
description: Activism fights injustice. It’s at the heart of radical political and social change. Check in here to meet equally motivated and passionate individuals. Unite, fight, and make your voice heard.

name: Puzzles
description: Post your Wordle scores and more in a community dedicated to mental health. Puzzles keep your brain active, keep you entertained, and boost your problem-solving skills. We’re happy to support mental wellbeing.

name: Politics
description: Today’s political issues served up at source. Get an immediacy that’s beyond the reach of mainstream media. Plus a side order of inclusivity and tolerance.

name: Space
description: Whether you’re an accomplished astronaut, a novice astronomer, or anything in between, it’s our mission to expand your knowledge or connect you with like-minded space enthusiasts.

name: US Politics
description: Navigate the intricate landscape of US politics. Gain insights into governance, policies, and the democratic process. Your window into the heartbeat of the nation's decision-making.

name: Disabled Voices
description: The world isn’t inclusive but the Newsmast community for disabled individuals is. Share experiences, discuss disability justice, and combat isolation. Promote education and advocacy and build solidarity.

name: Business
description: Business touches everything - so it matters, a lot. But how should business be organised so it is accountable to all its stakeholders? Whether the answer is circular, inclusive or socially responsible, join us here for good-faith discussions on the good, the bad and the different.

name: Government & Policy
description: Get straight to the heart of government. Enjoy impartial, credible, and constructive policy analysis and dive into open resources in a lively community of policymakers, activists, students, and of course - the public.

name: AI
description: Is AI a good thing? Or all we all redundant? If it is good, what’s next? What does the future look like? We’ve got all the AI developments right here. Stay informed among a diverse global community.

name: Performing Arts
description: Break the Fourth Wall. We connect performing artists with the audience in a mutual celebration of music, art, dance, and drama. Join us and widen the audience.

name: Academia & Research
description: Embark on a journey of academia and research. Delve into a world where knowledge knows no bounds. Explore, learn, and contribute to the pursuit of understanding.

name: Pets
description: Into iguanas? Fixated by fish? Or maybe you just love cats and dogs. Come back here often to connect over a mutual love of our furry, scaly and feathery friends.

name: Technology
description: Collaboration to make a difference is the goal here. We’re not about brand promotion – just a passion for cutting-edge technology and the difference it can make to our lives.

name: Breaking News
description: Fill your feed with breaking news from trustworthy sources around the world. Each week we'll highlight different sources in the Recommended timeline.

name: Immigrants Rights
description: Collectively, we have a moral duty to give refugees, asylum seekers, and all other immigrants the aid to help them assimilate into a new society and lead happy, prosperous lives.

name: Creative Arts
description: Creative expression is proven to help wellbeing. Expressing yourself through drawing, painting, poetry or music is great for mindfulness. Build your skills in a community that’s chock-full of creativity.

name: Visual Arts
description: Artist or art lover, you’ll know that art purifies your experiences, goals, ambitions, and dreams. Bookmark this community for all things 3D art, anime illustrations, collages, oil paintings, and more.

name: Chemistry
description: Chemistry is ever-changing. It describes matter and its transformations, the science that defines molecules, nanostructures, and extended solids, and their properties, reactions and applications. Debate the issues here.

name: Biodiversity & Rewilding
description: When the bees have gone, it’s all over. Each living thing on our planet, from the tiniest micro-organisms to entire ecosystems, has its part to play. Understanding begins here and it’s just the first step.

name: Nature & Wildlife
description: Applaud the beauty of the natural world and the joy of exploration in our Nature & Wildlife community. Recommend, share, nourish. Marvel at the wonder of the natural world and help the creatures that inhabit it thrive.

name: Democracy & Human Rights
description:
“To deny people their human rights is to challenge their very humanity” – Nelson  Mandela.

Democracy is at the heart of a fair, free society. So do we need to challenge the current political landscape? Here we can work together to promote democracy and challenge human-rights violations across the world.

name: Gaming
description: From haptic technology to human-computer interaction and from AI to in-game chatting, you can talk gaming here among your kind of people.

name: Humour
description: Need comic relief? Come back here for memes, belly laughs, chortles, giggles, sniggers, and coffee spurts. Keep it clean where you can.

name: Markets & Finance
description: "There are no limits to what free men, free women, and free markets can accomplish” – Jack Kemp. The free market means liberty, rights, and the ability for everyone to contribute to society. Let’s collaborate to improve our knowledge of how to make money work for us and for society.

name: Climate change
description: David Attenborough says the next 50 years will determine the fate of all life. That’s why we’re inspiring action against the greatest threat to humanity. Join the community and help save our planet.

name: Engineering
description: Engineering creates devices, machines, and software to solve complex problems. Robots, microprocessors, power grids, cellular networks, and artificial limbs are all the work of engineers. Let’s swap stories here.

name: Workers Rights
description: We’re here to advocate for labour rights and dignity in the workplace. Unite to improve working conditions, promote fairness, education, and make positive change for the labour movement.

name: Mathematics
description: Maths is everywhere. It’s in personal finances, design and engineering, scientific research, STEM, and even nature. It’s essential for developing new technologies and advancing human knowledge. Suits us fine.

name: US Sport
description: Step into the realm of US sports. Journey through iconic games, legendary athletes, and unmatched excitement. Your gateway to the heart-pounding world of American sportsmanship.

name: Mental Health & Wellbeing
description: “Just because no one else can heal or do your inner work for you, doesn’t mean you can, should, or need to do it alone” – Lisa Olivera. Welcome to your go-to hub for all things mental health.

name: Philosophy
description: Philosophy gets to the heart of knowledge, reality and existence. It helps develop critical-thinking skills and gives us a basis for decision-making around difficult ethical decisions. Explore knowledge for all for good.

name: TV & Radio
description: TV and radio is a world of endless stories and entertainment. It’s a powerful tool for personal expression and changing lives. Podcasters, presenters, and radio personalities unite and become a force for good.

name: Healthcare
description: Free, evidence-based resources for healthcare workers. All backed by contributions from leading doctors, nurses, and researchers.

name: Social Media
description: Explore the dynamic social media landscape. Analyze trends, platforms, and their societal impact. Your guide to understanding the ever-evolving digital connections shaping today's world.

name: Black Voices
description: Connect, exchange opinions and ideas, and learn from experts such as historians, professors, and anti-racist activists about black lives. Dive into culture, history, and news right here.

name: Travel
description: A space to check out the many wonders of the world. Get inspiration for this summer’s holiday or your next home, or just find the perfect lockscreen among the many stunning photographs.

name: Photography
description: Portrait, landscape, long exposure, macro, our photography community is here for it all. Share the art, application, and practice of creating durable images by recording light with professionals and amateurs.

name: LGBTQ+
description: No discrimination here. Drop into the LGBTQ+ community, feel seen, be heard, and empower each other in the fight for acceptance and equality.

name: Movies
description: Escape the world awhile in a great movie, then talk about it here. Make recommendations from romance to horror and from thriller to drama. What’s Oscar-worthy and what’s not? Drop your blockbuster views here.

name: Programming
description: Unlock the realm of programming. From writing code to building algorithms, dive into the world of logical creativity. Your launchpad for turning ideas into functional reality.

name: Weather
description: Weather can make your day or wash out your plans. And apps can miss the mark. So get real-time, on-the-ground updates from whoever’s where you plan to be. All things weather, for all regions.

name: Poverty & Inequality
description: How do we eliminate poverty and inequality? Education, clean water, nutrition, and healthcare are just the start. Help us advocate, educate, and organise for system change and a more just and equitable world.

name: Science
description: Connect, build bridges, and discuss the latest developments across all scientific disciplines. Advance human knowledge, and let curiosity and learning thrive.

name: Energy & Pollution
description: How do we reach net-zero? The energy transition is at the heart of environmental discourse and the sector is one of the leading contributors to harmful emissions in our air. Dig into collective knowledge, ask questions, and fight for a cleaner future.

name: Environment
description: Climate change hasn’t slowed down, and we also need to address the air we breathe, the quality of the Earth’s water, and the survival of the plants and animals around us that form the delicate yet crucial ecosystem that keeps the world alive and kicking. There’s no Planet B.

name: Humanities
description: Get close to the core of the human condition. The humanities community wades deep into classics, literature, history, and more to offer equal access to knowledge to all.

name: Music
description: “Where words fail, music speaks” – Hans Christian Andersen. We unite musicians and music fans to share their talent and passions in a community that spreads both joy and important, meaningful messages.

name: Law & Justice
description: We live in conflict-ridden times and our need for justice is greater than ever. Drop in here to debate human rights, prison reform, and more, among legal eagles, academics, and armchair QCs.
